preqs: Must have passed 96 credit points including MEC3455 or MAE2401 or TRC2201.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-MECH, MAEMECH01} Otherwise true

For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise ((Must have passed 96 (I/W) credit points AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MAE2401, MEC3455}) OR  (Must have passed 96 (I/W) credit points AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {TRC2201}))
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {CME4616, CME4617, MEC4422} and  Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MEC4426%})

description: Finite element analysis (FEA) in computer-aided design; finite element formulation; first-order and second-order elements; stiffness matrix; integration points and stress recovery; convergence and mesh refinement; FEA of plane stress and plane strain problems; FEA of axisymmetric problems; FEA of nonlinear materials; FEA of contact problems; FEA of large deformation problems; FEA of dynamic problems; FEA of fracture mechanics.
